code: import axios from"axios";import{BASE_URL}from"../constants/urls";import{goToRecipesList}from"../routers/coordinator";export var login=function login(body,clear,history){axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/login"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem('token',res.data.token);clear();goToRecipesList(history);}).catch(function(err){alert(err.response.data.menssage);});};export var SingUp=function SingUp(body,clear,history){axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/signup"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem('token',res.data.token);clear();goToRecipesList(history);}).catch(function(err){alert('Nome ou email não cadastrado');});};
